p.k: Simone (Loes Haverkort) inherits a dilapidated country house in France and makes her way there with her husband Eric and their two children. Her dream is to renovate the house but as the hectic pace of the rebuilding gets underway, she gets falls into the romance and chaos of it all. Losing sight of her goals, she must find her way back to the dreams and ambitions that brought her there in the first place.
